document.docAuthor: Stauffer Jr, Jay R., Black, Kristin & Konings, Adrianus F.
document.masterDocTitle: Descriptions of five new species of Metriaclima (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Malaŵi, Africa

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Descriptions of five new species of Metriaclima (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Malaŵi, Africa

heading.emphasis:
Key to the formally described species of
Metriaclima

paragraph.keyLead:
1 Females
beige to yellow with yellow pigment in anal fin...................................................... 2
- Females brown, dark gray or blue without yellow anal fin..................................................... 15

- Males without yellow pigment on cheek and breast...................................................
M. phaeos

4 Cheek depth less than 25 % body depth ( 20.3–24.8 %BD)...........................................
M. flavifemina

- Cheek depth more than 25 % body depth ( 25.3 –32.0% BD).......................................
M. nigrodorsalis
5 Six or fewer bars (distinct or faint) below dorsal fin......................................................... 6
- Seven or more bars (distinct or faint) below dorsal fin........................................................ 7
- Males with clear pelvic fin or dark band in pelvic fin........................................................ 9

- Males without black pigment in anal fin.......................................................
M. hajomaylandi

- Males with white/blue dorsal fin.......................................................
M. mossambicum
(part)

14 Fourteen–nineteen, mode 16 of teeth in outer row of lower left jaw.....................................
M. glaucos

- Fifteen–twenty five, mode 22 of teeth in outer row of lower left jaw................................
M. chrysomallos

26 Anal fin same orange color as dorsal fin..............................................
M. cyneusmarginatum
(part)

28 Distance between snout and pelvic-fin origin more than 35 %SL.....................................
M. pambazuko

- Distance between snout and pelvic-fin origin less than 33 %SL.......................................
M. emmiltos

29 Base of pectoral fin in males yellow........................................................
M. fainzilberi
(part)

- Base of pectoral in males white to blue.........................................................
M. pyrsonotos

31 Occipital region light blue without dark bars or spots................................................
M. pulpican

32 Base of pectoral fin in males yellow.......................................................
M. fainzilberi
(part)

33 Males
without black submarginal band in dorsal fin........................................................ 34

34 Males
without extension of lateral bars onto dorsal fin....................................................... 35
- Males with extension of lateral bars onto dorsal fin........................................................ 37

- Males without black pigment in anal fin..............................................
M. cyneusmarginatum
(part)
